page.title: Stocks Gain on Siebel, Oil Below \$50
page.text: NEW YORK (Reuters) - U.S. stocks rose on Monday as software company Siebel Systems Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=SEBL.O target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">SEBL.O</A> boosted technology shares with a better-than-expected sales outlook and Friday's start-of-quarter buying spree ran into the new week.
